direction.description: Feeling lost at sea? Find information on how to get to ShellHacks and where to park below:
direction.title: Venue Address

Northbound.title: Coming North of FIU BBC
directions: Take exit 16 for NE 203rd Street/Ives Dairy Rd
Turn left onto NE 203rd Street/Ives Dairy Rd
Turn right onto US-1 South/Biscayne Blvd
Turn left toward Kovens Conference Center

Southbound.title: Coming South of FIU BBC
directions: Take exit 10B for NW 135th Street/Opa-Locka Blvd
Turn right onto NW 135th Street/Opa-Locka Blvd
Turn left toward Kovens Conference Center

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Parking is available for free in Parking Lot 5. You must register your car upon arrival when you check in (don’t forget your plate number!)

transportation.title: Buses
transportation.description: Buses will be sent to schools with the most registrations (so be sure to spread the word!). Check back later for the list of schools and links to sign up!

shouldBring.description: We want everyone feeling fine and sandy at ShellHacks! Here are some items we suggest to bring with you for a great time:

tracksDesc: Do you love tinkering with databases, but aren’t really sure how the front-end works? Or maybe all you’ve ever done is Java, but you really want to work with microcontrollers? At ShellHacks, we offer learning tracks for everyone to learn new skills in any field they’re interested in!
